The PDF version of this webpage can be found here [here](exc4.pdf).

Write a report on the debate Frequentist vs Bayesianists. Provide a brief description of each position, highlight notable accomplishments of each group, decide if you think more like a frequentist or a bayesianist.

#### Resources

-   https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC6406060/

-   https://towardsdatascience.com/statistics-are-you-bayesian-or-frequentist-4943f953f21b

#### Report Guideline

-   3-4 Pages

-   Must include a title page

-   Double Spaced

-   12 point font

-   Proofread your work

-   Submit a pdf of your work to Canvas

-   Due 12/2/2022
